title: CEO of major Asian bank says 'a big, big challenge' is looming for the global economy

title: DBS Group CEO says the pandemic-induced economic pain could be worse than expected
text: Piyush Gupta, CEO of DBS Group, says small businesses are clearly "running out of revenue" and more could go out of business as they deal with the economic hit from the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Oil falls as worsening pandemic threatens recovery
text: Oil prices dipped on Monday, weighed down by the prospect that a rise in the pace of coronavirus infections could derail a recovery in fuel demand.

title: Asian shares defensive; eyes on EU summit, U.S. stimulus talks
text: Asian shares began warily on Monday as investors eyed efforts to stitch together more fiscal stimulus in the eurozone and United States to help economies ride out the effects of a record jump in COVID-19 cases globally.
